mapper.select: SELECT g.siguNum, g.siguName, dongNum, dongName FROM CATEGORYGU g JOIN DONG d ON d.siguNum = g.siguNum WHERE d.siguNum = #{siguNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO localComm(num, subject, content, hitCount, regDate, userId, siguNum, dongNum) VALUES (#{num}, #{subject}, #{content} ,#{hitCount}, SYSDATE, #{userId}, #{siguNum}, #{dongNum})
INSERT INTO localCommFile(fileNum, originalFilename ,num, saveFilename,fileSize ) VALUES (localCommFile_seq.NEXTVAL, #{originalFilename},#{num},#{saveFilename},#{fileSize} )
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM localComm l JOIN member1 m ON l.userId=m.userId

SELECT l.num,subject, l.userId, userName, hitCount, TO_CHAR(l.regDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regDate, NVL(fileCount, 0) fileCount FROM localComm l JOIN member1 m ON m.userId=l.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT num, COUNT(*) fileCount FROM localCommFile GROUP BY num ) f ON l.num=f.num ORDER BY num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
SELECT num, l.userId, userName, subject, content, regDate, hitCount FROM localComm l JOIN member1 m ON l.userId=m.userId WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE localComm SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.select:
SELECT num, subject FROM localComm l JOIN member1 m ON l.userId=m.userId
AND (num > #{num})
ORDER BY num ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT num, subject FROM localComm n JOIN member1 m ON l.userId=m.userId
AND (num < #{num})
ORDER BY num DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
